title: Empowering Men to Be Godly Mentors
itunes:author: Guests: Joe Battaglia & Joe Pellegrino
itunes:summary: There are many fatherless boys who would benefit from a godly man's guidance and stability. John and Danny discuss how men can make a difference in kids' lives through mentoring. Receive the book Fathers Say with your gift of any amount!
description: There are many fatherless boys who would benefit from a godly man's guidance and stability. John and Danny discuss how men can make a difference in kids' lives through mentoring. Receive the book Fathers Say with your gift of any amount!
